description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8viqe","text":"The following protocol describes culture and treatment of the S.aureus-based biofilm and techniques that can be used to asses its eradication/removal. The protocol covers basic preparation and three techniques, namely: growth control, colony forming assay, and crystal violet staining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"827ap","text":"Culture bacteria strains in TSB at   for approximately   in order to reach mid-log phase (OD600 0.5-0.6).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":3},{"style":"sub","offset":92,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1b1ha","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C06730900A9F11EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"35","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":14400,"guid":"C4C3FB000A9F11EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"74dm","text":"Adjust bacterial suspensions to 107 CFU/mL in PPB (OD600= 0.01, ref: PPB).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":34,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":46,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":69,"length":3},{"style":"sub","offset":53,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aivpk","text":"Initiate biofilm formation in 24-well plate by covering surface with   of the adjusted cell suspension, and incubate the plate at   for   to allow the bacterial adhesion. Remove the content of the wells after this time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":130,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":136,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dauha","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"DF3AEC900AA011EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F0A849F00AA011EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"328196B00AA111EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eka71","text":"Cover the wells with   of TSB, and put a protective film before putting the lid to minimize the evaporation. Incubate the bacteria for at least  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":26,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":144,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"3489A6400AA211EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":64800,"guid":"5D1179300AA211EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6f21q","text":"Prepare your substance in either PBS or NaCl ( )  by serial dilution ranging from C to C/(X2) where X is the number of concentrations tested. A 24-well plate can hold 7 concentrations + negative control.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":40,"length":9},{"style":"sup","offset":91,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c9av5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"9","error_concentration":false,"guid":"E08E5CB00AA211EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":13}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"90nq","text":"Gently remove the TSB using either pipette or vacuum aspirator. After removing medium from a cell, immediately wash it with PPB, PBS or NaCl two times. After last washing add 1 mL of your sample. Repeat for concentration in triplicate. Same as before, apply protective film before incubating the plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":18,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":124,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":128,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":135,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95pmc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"chl3q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"well_plate_map","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":true,"guid":"90A148600AA311EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"well":[[{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/16"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/16"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/16"}],[{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/2"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/2"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/2"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/32"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/32"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/32"}],[{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/4"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/4"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/4C"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/64"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/64"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/64"}],[{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/8"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/8"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"C/8"},{"Color":"#FFEFEF","Data":"NEGATIVE CONTROL"},{"Color":"#FFEFEF","Data":"NEGATIVE CONTROL"},{"Color":"#FFEFEF","Data":"NEGATIVE CONTROL"}]]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ed43a","text":"Treat the biofilms at suitable temperature and time. This two factors have to be estimated prior to the treatment, for example by means of crystal violet staining (see below).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"am4hi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4judj","text":"After the biofilm matured, remove the 24-well plate from the incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9vfr7","text":"After the time has passed, remove the plate, and start removing the content of the well. After each removal, wash the remaining biofilm three times with either PBS, NaCl or PPB. Remove remaining liquid after and perform on of the techniques described below.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":160,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":165,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":173,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"79aak","text":"Add   of either PBS, NaCl or PPB to the well with a pipette, directly onto the bioflm, so the thrust of the liquid damage the biofilm. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":16,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":21,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"4BE950400AA411EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ekdjk","text":"Scratch the bottom of the well with a pipette tip and transfer the content to eppendorf tubes. Vortex-shake eppendorfs for couple of seconds or until reaching homogeneity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9f6ra","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3dkte","text":"Serially dilute the content of the eppendorf tubes in 96-well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a5ltq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f1q4s","text":"Plate 20µL of the content of the wells on the BHI medium prepared in the square Petri dish.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":46,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7u181","text":"Incubate Petri dish   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ep0l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":14400,"guid":"FAA9A4400AA411EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50pgs","text":"After that time, fix the biofilms by adding   of methanol to each well. Wait   and remove any remaining methanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":77,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bdoao","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"E1E077D00AA511EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"FA2081A00AA511EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8l606","text":"Add   of TSB to each well and indubate the plate at   for     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":52,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":58,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"4B6FBE000AA511EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6FACA0D00AA511EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":21600,"guid":"8B5C2EE00AA511EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":28800,"guid":"785C23900AA511EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e8mab","text":"Transfer the supernatant to 96-well plate and measure OD600, dilute with NaCl if necessary.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":56,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":73,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ce5dp","text":"Add  of   solution of crystal violet to each well and wait  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":3,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bgais","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"0FD9E0900AA611EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.06","error_concentration":false,"guid":"11784E500AA611EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":13}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"3EC327900AA611EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7keb2","text":"Remove any non-absorbed dye by washing gently stained biofilms with either PBS, NaCl or PPB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":75,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":80,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":88,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"u756","text":"At this moment you can perform brightfield microscopy of the biofilm to image better its structure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"erji1","text":"Add   of acetic acid to the wells and gently shake    them horizontally for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":52,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":76,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dp3sf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"B21B81600AA611EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B55D8D000AA611EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"120","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":33}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"D206BD500AA611EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fkltg","text":"Remove   od the solubilised pigment with a pipette and transfer it to 96-well plate and dilute serially with water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bjend","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"E95FC2800AA611EE90F0D532D0C1B116","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bdokn","text":"Record the absorption of the wells at 570 nm. The percent of the remaining biomass is calculated by dividing the A570 of the sample to A570 of the control.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":38,"length":6},{"style":"sub","offset":114,"length":3},{"style":"sub","offset":136,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: S. aureus biofilm removal multi-assay
